name: Under One Wing
description: Fairy Fight - A large-scale dogfight, utilizing the finest warplanes the world has ever known. Sasaki Junichi is the grandson of a legendary FF Pilot. He arrives at the student dormitory of a legendary FF academy known as Shouou Academy, only to find... every other tenant is a woman!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32bit or 64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or Higher Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: On-Board GPU Storage: 3 GB available space
